dl.Extraction_Notes: All fields were clearly visible and extracted from the driver's license displayed in the image. Middle name 'PIKRY' was extracted from the license image itself, while other fields were also present in the text form below the image.

banking.Extraction_Notes: Account Type not specified on the document. Designation number was identified but not used for Bank_Account_Number based on the note indicating it's not always required for direct deposits and the explicit 'Account No.' field.

ownership.Extraction_Notes: VIN_Last_6 was derived from the VIN. Registration_Date '16.07.28' interpreted as DD.MM.YY (July 16, 2028).

lien.Extraction_Notes: The document explicitly states 'No Match. No registered financing statement or registered claim for lien was found for this enquiry.', so Lien_Status is set to 'None'. The VIN was extracted from the 'Search Criteria'. No other lien-related details such as Debtor Name, Year, Make, Model, Lender Name, Lien Amount, Outstanding Amount, Per Diem, or Valid Until Date were found as there was no match for the inquiry.

verification_results.comment_for_task: All required identity verification checks passed successfully.
verification_results.validation_reasoning: First name 'HANY' and last name 'BISKALY' from the Bill of Sale exactly match the driver's license (case-insensitive). The ID expiration date '11/14/2027' is well beyond the Bill of Sale effective date '11/18/2025', thus the ID is not expired and is valid.

failure_details.specific_issue: Bank Account Type is not specified as 'Chequing'. It must be 'Chequing' to pass validation.

verification_results.validation_reasoning: Validation failed due to the Bank Account Type. The provided banking data did not specify the account type as 'Chequing'. Name match between BOS Customer Name and Bank Account Holder Name passed successfully. The Bank Institution Number, Transit Number, and Account Number all conformed to their respective required digit structures.

failure_details.specific_issue: Ownership duration insufficient: Registration Date (2028-07-16) is after BOS Effective Date (2025-11-18).

verification_results.validation_reasoning: The VIN (4T1BB46K97U004095) matches between the Bill of Sale and ownership data. Vehicle details (Year: 2007, Make: Toyota/TOYT, Model: Camry Hybrid/CAM) are also considered a match, accounting for common abbreviations. However, the ownership registration date (July 16, 2028) is significantly after the BOS effective date (November 18, 2025), resulting in a negative ownership duration relative to the BOS. This fails the rule requiring the vehicle to be owned for at least 60 days prior to the BOS date, as the registration is in the future relative to the BOS.

All validation checks passed. The VIN from the Bill of Sale (4T1BB46K97U004095) matches the VIN from the Lien document (4T1BB46K97U004095). The Lien document explicitly states 'No Match' and a 'None' status with an outstanding amount of 0.00. Given the absence of an 'Applicable Loan Balance' in the Bill of Sale data, the outstanding amount of 0 from the lien document is considered reconciled, indicating no outstanding lien.
